title: About Us
description: AIPartners.asia (AIP) is a technology ecosystem specializing in providing comprehensive One-stop AI Transformation solutions specifically for businesses in Vietnam and the Asia-Pacific (APAC) region.
storyContent: AIP was established in June 2024 with an operating model including AI Builders – AI Trainers – AI Workforce – AI Agent Market, helping businesses access AI easily and cost-effectively. We don't just consult – but also directly build, deploy and train to bring AI into actual operations, connecting resources from Vietnam, Japan and Thailand to promote intelligent and sustainable digital transformation.
visionText: To become the leading trusted partner in artificial intelligence applications, contributing to building an intelligent and sustainable future.
missionText: Harness the power of synergy within the ecosystem – connecting, supporting, and enhancing capabilities among ecosystem partners, co-creating appropriate and breakthrough AI solutions for businesses.
valuesText: Innovation, superior quality, ethics in technology, and commitment to customer service.
visionText: To become the ideal one-stop station for all AI transformation needs – where comprehensive resources, solutions and experts converge, accompanying businesses on their AI transformation journey effectively, practically and successfully.
missionText: Harness the power of synergy within the ecosystem – connecting, supporting, and enhancing capabilities among ecosystem partners, co-creating appropriate and breakthrough AI solutions for businesses.

values.title: AI Transformation – Growth & Optimization
values.description: Focus on practical AI transformation solutions that optimize operations and drive sustainable business growth.

values.title: One-stop AI enablement network
values.description: Provide comprehensive services – from strategic consulting, training, AI application development to human resource deployment – under a single ecosystem.
